name: THE BLAFOVEN
description:
This game was created by team Sat Viz ++ during the 2020's Global Game Jam in Athens, Greece.  No team members were abused during the production of the game!

Team Sat Viz++ :

Kostas Cheliotis - Programming

Anna Virimine - 2D Art

Zannis Bafaloukos - 3D Models

Chris Douris - Sound Design

Georg Tsabou - Animations and VFX

Controls :

1. Use the left mouse button to grab and release an object.
2. Use the scroll wheel to move an object further or closer.
3. Use WASD buttons to turn the object around.
